Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Relates to increasing certain special accidental death benefits
Summary: Relates to increasing certain special accidental death benefits; increases the special accidental death benefit paid to a widow or widower or the deceased member's children under the age of eighteen, or if a student, under the age of twenty-three.
LawCode: Amd ยง208-f, Gen Muni L; amd ยง361-a, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the retirement and social security law, in relation to increasing certain special accidental death benefits
